name: Temple of Méra
description: Temple of Méra is a fantasy-adventure game that takes place in the middle of an old overgrown fortress. To find the way out of the dungeon, the player guides the girl Liv in solving environmental puzzles across four unique and mysterious levels. Forest Temple was made by four game development students from Sweden. The whole process took six weeks. We hope to give feelings of progression and success throughout the game together with an exciting experience.
